name: chantilly crochet summer top
notes:
this pattern is available for [free on my blog][1]. the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern (including all photo tutorials + a bonus garment schematic), in one printable file without advertisements.

make yourself a crochet summer top that’s perfect for those sun-soaked days and balmy nights. 

the chantilly summer top is the epitome of summer chic. crafted with lacy crochet stitches and a cotton, bamboo, linen blend yarn, its breathable fabric ensures coolness even on the hottest of days. 

[purchase the kit here! (aff)][2] lion brand also has a full kit of the chantilly crochet top, available on their website. the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern.

**size inclusive**
women’s sizes x-small (small, medium, large, x-large, 2x-large, 3x-large, 4x-large, 5x-large) to fit chest 28-30” (32-34”, 36-38", 40-42”, 44-46", 48-50”, 52-54", 56-58",  60 - 62”).

instructions included for adjusting top length.

**yarn**
the sample in the photos was crocheted with lion brand yarns cotton bamboo linen (50 g / 1.75oz / 164 yards / 150 m /
40% cotton / 35% bamboo / 25% linen). other sport weight (2) yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met.

**pattern notes**
the pattern is a written pattern and also includes a garment schematic and photo tutorials where needed.

crochet summer top design is an a crocheted simplicity original design.
